caption: triangle Choke
description: this is when you are on your back and you have your legs wrapped around your opponents neck and you are choking them out.

caption: leg lock
description: this is when you are on your back and you have your legs wrapped around your opponents leg and you are trying to break their leg.

caption: Kneebar
description: this is when you are on your back and you have your legs wrapped around your opponents leg and you are trying to break their leg.

caption: Bow and arrow choke
description: this is when you are on your back and you have your legs wrapped around your opponents neck and you are choking them out.

caption: Heel hook
description: this is when you are on your back and you have your legs wrapped around your opponents leg and you are trying to break their leg.
